thread.title: Goodell Plans Seven-Figure Penalty for Cowboys Owner Jerry Jones

author: Andrew Beaton
title: Goodell Plans Seven-Figure Penalty for Cowboys Owner Jerry Jones

organizations.name: goodell plans seven-figure penalty for cowboys owner jerry jones national football league

text:
National Football League Commissioner Roger Goodell is preparing to hit Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones with a seven-figure bill to cover the costs of the league’s recent battles with him, according to two people familiar with the matter.
The planned action amounts to punishment against Jones for his actions in recent months that other owners have said were “detrimental” to the league. Jones has been pitted against Goodell and his fellow owners in recent months in a battle over an impending contract extension for Goodell.
...
